OOC: Collective post for Tucson Prime, Nightshift, Quickstride and Rat Trap=
.

BIC: Having been blind for a long time, Tucson Prime was no stranger to =
having his eyes covered.  It was actually a welcomed development, as he had=
 become quite accustomed to being sightless.  He could hear and sense thing=
s with much more clarity then he was able to sense with even with his optic=
s. His transmitter kicks in as a sonar system once more.  It had been progr=
amed as such, but now, only used as a listening device.  It gives him infor=
mation about his surroundings and with his thermal sensory board, he gets a=
 general idea on what the room is like.  Room enough for only one bot.  It =
was hot, but being silver in color, he's able to deflect a good portion of =
that heat away from his body.  Yet, he remains placid to avoid overheating.=
  He knew that fighting would only make things worse for his systems.  Inst=
ead of giving a show of protest, he decides to get himself in a near medita=
tive state, relaxing his entire body so is not to cause strain on his syste=
m.  He had learned quite a bit about meditation from Ninjabot training, and=
 found it rather beneficial when encountered in times of great stress.  He =
could hear things outside, and realized he had contact ability with Rodimus=
.  All the while, even though he didn't show signs of strategizing, he sile=
ntly assembles a plan to himself as to how he was going to get out of his n=
ext predicament.  Phase one was already in place.  It was time for phase tw=
o.  Getting captured was not part of the plan at first, but then in all res=
pects he could see the advantages of being caught.  He had close contact wi=
th Rodimus and this was a perfect opportunity to turn things around without=
 really raising suspicions.  As soon as he had something in mind, he casual=
ly turns his head in Rodimus's direction, following the mild sonar signal h=
e bounces off, which hones in on Rodimus without actually having any effect=
s on anyone.  

"Tell me Rodimus, have you ever once been appreciated for a=
ll the effort you've given to Hydras?  From the sounds of things I don't th=
ink you're even recognized for your attributes."

In Night Shift's cell, Ni=
ght Shift also uses a very meditative state, to avoid getting himself overh=
eated.  He had learned that in tight situations, meditation was the best me=
dicine. After a few moments of meditation, he casually looks around.  The m=
ore relaxed his body was, the less stress he places on his system.  And the=
 less stress he puts on his system, the less he felt tortured.  

"Not exac=
tly my type of architecture but at least we're gettn' some energon down her=
e."

He grins to himself.

"That's right, the less agression we show the mo=
re frustrated our guards will be.  These guys expect us ta put up a fuss, y=
eah, well, I ain't gonna buy inta that.  And I know Tucson Prime ain't eith=
er.  I just hope Kup catches onta this'n does the same... Poor guy, I don't=
 wanna see him get overheated."

Outside the fortress, Rat Trap spots the o=
ncomming objects, and holds on tight to Quickstride's mane.

"We got tailga=
ters!"

Quickstride quickens his gallop and tries to step it up. At the sam=
e time, his stomach rumbles, as it feels as if it's getting just a bit bloa=
ted.  He had overdosed on the bean pods, and now his system was about to pa=
y for it.  

" Uh ohh..  Rat trap, Umm.. You - better cover your nose."

Ra=
t Trap looks down to him.

"I'm tryn' ta hold on for dear life here!  Why'd=
ya want me ta do that for?!"

Quickstride's hooves almost appear not to tou=
ch the ground as he really accelerates in his gallop.

" Because in a fract=
ion of a nanosecond, things are NOT going to smell too good around here."

=
Rat Trap does as told.

"You're right, that ain't such a bad idea!"

No soo=
ner does he cover his nose, Quickstride releases a large cloud of noxious f=
umes from his tail end which aleviates his bloat, enabling him to pick up h=
is pace.  A green cloud wafts upward.

OOC: The bean pods I'm reffering to =
were in Beast Wars, and had this effect on Rhinox who ate a considerable am=
ount of these gassy pods in a particularly funny episode.
